snippet: Senator Robert Menendez, a New Jersey Democrat who was indicted on corruption charges in April, is an outspoken critic of President Obama’s nuclear negotiations with Iran.
abstract: Disclosure report reveals that Sen Robert Menendez, Democrat of New Jersey indicted on federal corruption charges, has received many large donations toward his legal defense fund from prominent pro-Israel billionaires, both Republican and Democrat.
lead_paragraph: Senator Robert Menendez, a New Jersey Democrat who was indicted on corruption charges in April, is an outspoken critic of President Obama’s nuclear negotiations with Iran.

headline.main: Pro-Israel Billionaires From Both Parties Aid Menendez’s Defense Fund
headline.print_headline: Rich Backers of Israel Assist Menendez
